Welcome to the MOSAiC resource portal.

This repository now serves complementary purposes of direct data delivery and an user-friendly JBrowse genome browser.

## 



```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)

features <- read_tsv("../data/example_features.tsv", comment = "#", guess_max = 100000)

# (Optional) select / rename columns
features_small <- features %>%
  select( seqid = 1, start = 4, end = 5, strand = 7, type = 3 )

datatable(
  features_small,
  filter = "top",
  extensions = c("Buttons","Scroller"),
  options = list(
    dom = "Bfrtip",
    buttons = c("copy","csv"),
    pageLength = 25,
    deferRender = TRUE,
    scrollY = 500,
    scroller = TRUE
  )
)
```
